short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds an interactive dictionary to subtitles of videos on the Easy Languages YouTube channels.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easy Languages Dictionary helps you learn languages. It provides translations of individual words in the subtitles of videos published by any of the Easy Languages YouTube channels.

Most languages available on the Easy Languages channels are supported, but not all. If something doesn't work, please open an issue on the project's GitHub page and I will do my best to fix it.
